title: Static Analysis

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup] flag is missing.
manifest_analysis.desc: The flag [android:allowBackup] should be set to false. By default it is set to true and allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup] flag is missing.

manifest_analysis.title:
Activity (.ActLittleActivity) is not Protected.
An intent-filter exists.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Activity is explicitly exported.
manifest_analysis.name: is not Protected.An intent-filter exists.

manifest_analysis.title:
Broadcast Receiver (.NotesBootStart) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
manifest_analysis.name: is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.[android:exported=true]

The App logs information. Sensitive info.cwe: CWE-532 - Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File

strings: "intro_text1" : "Set repeating alerts to remind you to take a break and do some quick exercise to be healthy while you are busy making wealth."

"notestext_head_spin2" : "ZZZ Relax back on your seat and ease your head. Now bend your head forward and then slowly backwards. Repeat this 10 times. Do it gently. Close your eyes while doing this. Now bend your head towards left and then to right. Repeat this slowly for ten times. ZZZ"

"notes_intro" : "Welcome to Take-a-Break! 
Take small breaks for your health while you make wealth :). Configure breaks here."
"promo_string" : "Next version will bring more exercises and profiles."

"help" : " Welcome to Take-a-Break! 

Here is little app to help you take breaks in between work and do some lazy exercises 

* Start by configuring break interval time, start and end time and days etc. 

* You will be presented a pop-up screen after set interval with alert notification and a short exercise brief. 

* Enjoy doing the short exercise described in notes. 

* You can stop the alert sound and vibration on notes screen by touching on it or pressing volume key. 

* (checkout www.yogakaram.com) 

 "
